description:
Listed Building Consent in relation to change of use of County Court (Sui Generis) to educational accommodation (D1). Installation of roof top ventilation and cooling plant along with external alterations. (Removal of two external steel fire escapes on front elevation, removal of basement and ground floor level hoist, removal of 1930's front entrance and platform area, installation of two new entrance doors to rear elevation, installation of new roof glazing with opening rooflights, and refurbishment of sash windows).
Removal of internal structural walls and partitions, installation of new lift, escape stair, mezzanine level and services associated with conversion to a school. (Full Planning Application P061606 also submitted)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The fireplace in the first floor judges room shall be carefully removed under the supervision of a contractor specialising in this work appointed by the applicant and approved by the Local Planning Authority and stored undercover in a safe place for reinstatement in a position to be agreed with the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To protect the special interest of the building included in the Statutory List.
